summary: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.
cast: Jackie Chan|Michelle Yeoh|Maggie Cheung|Kenneth Tsang|Wah Yuen|Bill Tung|Josephine Koo|Kelvin Wong|Philip Chan|Ken Lo|Lieh Lo|Wai Shum|Yi-Sheng Han|Sze Tsuen Wai|Wai-Lun Tuan|Wong Yue Man|Chi-Ming Lau|Wai-Man Tam|Stone Chan|Kin-Shing Choi|Burt Kwouk|Mars|Kim Penn|Noel Rands|Robert Samuels|Burton Sharp|John Wakefield|Ming-Sing Wong
title: Supercop
